A Béarnais man used his birthday pot to pay for a mountain journey for Alzheimer’s sufferers.
A Béarnais man used his birthday pot to pay for a mountain journey for Alzheimer’s sufferers.
#Béarnais #man #birthday #pot #pay #mountain #journey #Alzheimers #sufferers This is a exceptional and uncommon act of generosity. Anthony Escofet, a 28-year-old Béarnais man, was amongst 14 residents of Ehpad Nouste Maysou.A unit on the Pau Hospital Center devoted to sufferers affected by mind illnesses reminiscent of Alzheimer’s illness. Spend a day within the mountains. […]
